description: A simple and delicious meal, this vegan Spaghetti with Olive Oil and Garlic makes the perfect weeknight or special occasion dinner.
keywords: Spaghetti with Olive Oil and Garlic
name: Spaghetti with Olive Oil and Garlic
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Bari Extra Virgin Olive Oil

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Once boiling, add noodles and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Boil pasta for 7-9 minutes, until al dente.
While the pasta is cooking, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic.
Lightly saut√©, stirring occasionally, until garlic is fragrant and light brown, about 7 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in red pepper flakes if using.
Drain pasta water, reserving 2 tablespoons. Do not rinse pasta with water; the starch of the noodles helps bind the sauce to the pasta.
Toss noodles in olive oil/garlic mixture and top with fresh parsley, vegan parmesan, and salt to taste. If pasta seems dry, add reserved water.

video.description:
A simple and delicious meal, this vegan Spaghetti with Olive Oil and Garlic makes the perfect weeknight or special occasion dinner.

Get the full recipe here: https://www.mydarlingvegan.com/spaghetti-olive-oil-garlic/
